title: Falling
genres: Origin Grid Comics (原点格子漫画)
description:
Description :
        Everyone knows about Yang Ming Middle School. Zhou Wan is a quiet introvert, while Lu Xixiao is unruly and outspoken. The two are worlds apart, and have nothing in common. No one would've expected that one day they would stand together. "Some people will love you amidst splendor, and some will love you even when you're covered in mud." The story involves a rebellious and rich 2nd generation playboy and a well-behaved academic weapon girl
